post:
BREAKING NEWS: VPSLatch is now proud to introduce instant cPanel licensing with every VPS package! VPSLatch is now the world's FIRST VPS provider to be able to offer instant setup + licensing on cPanel based VPS! No more waiting around to start hosting!

DISCOUNT! - VOUCHER: 25managedoff: Enjoy a 25% off recurring discount, LIFETIME discount for the life of your VPS! Can be used on any billing cycle!

* NEW * VPSLatch is now officially doing a prize draw every month on every active client. You are free to receive some awesome prizes such as an iPod shuffle, if you get chosen as the winner. Free shipping worldwide so any client regardless of the location can win, see more details here!

Features:
  • Fully Managed! We will do literally anything you ask for! Some examples are...

  • Server Hardening: We will harden and secure your server upon your request! This will include firewall setup, BFD, SSH hardening, httpd hardening, PHP hardening, and much more!
  • Security audits: We seal the hackers ways in before they even get a chance!
  • Site migration: Moving from another host? Our support team will be able to move your sites with care, as long as the control panels match on both of the servers.
  • 24x7x365 httpd/named monitoring - if we find httpd or named down, we will bring it back up within minutes! You can now sleep well knowing that your websites are online.
  • Superb Support: Got a question or problem? Don't worry, we got your back. Our front-line support engineers are technical experts. You won't be passed from department to department, and we guarantee it.
  • RAID10 protected hard drive space!
  • Offsite automated backups: You don't have to remember to do these every day, week, or month! You're protected against fire, flood, hurricane, and even the Taliban with our offsite backups every night.
  • OpenVZ virtualization
  • SolusVM VPS control panel: You can manage your VPS at SolusVM, such as rebooting, reinstalling, checking bandwidth usage, and much more!
  • Free cPanel/WHM control panel: All managed VPS packages are eligible for free cPanel/WHM!
  • Private Nameservers: Create your own private name servers at no extra cost for complete white-label!
  • Instant setup: All managed VPS packages are set up instantly after your order - you no longer have to wait hours to receive your VPS!
  • Total Control: You will receive full root access to your virtual private server, meaning you have total control via cPanel/WHM and SSH. You can modify your own php.ini configuration, install PHP modules/addons, install scripts/software, and much more! The possibilities are endless!

Operating Systems:
CentOS 5.5 (required for cPanel/WHM)
Debian 5.0
Fedora 10
Gentoo
OpenSuse 10
Ubuntu 8.04
Ubuntu 9.04
Ubuntu 10.04
Any other Linux OS upon request

Testimonials:

Our clients speak for us!
Below are some testimonials made by actual customers. Our clients are happy with our service, and we're making sure they are satisfied. Period.

pope967 said:
I feel motivated by the exceptional handling of my last support request by VPSLatch. A human response in 3 minutes on a Sunday morning Thanksgiving weekend? Excellent! I'm a happy customer!
Click to expand...

Source: http://www.webhostingtalk.com/showthread.php?t=1001456

Frankly, I have no idea how VPSLatch can offer managed VPS packages at these low prices, but I am certainly enjoying the phenomenal service and pricing.

thebobzilla said:
I choose VPSLATCH not only for their price, but the many great reviews, and services that VPSLATCH offers. Not only was I pleasantly surprised how easy running a VPS server is, but Adam and his crew have responded almost instantly to my demands! I have closed down 4 other websites and moved all my service to VPSLATCH, including 4 fps games, and a voice servers. Thanks Adam and crew..job well done!
